DOC.brief_title: The Different Analgesic Potency Volatile Anesthetics Equi-MAC
DOC.detailed_description: Volatile anesthetic vary relative hypnotic potency . Recent study demonstrate equi-minimum alveolar concentration various volatile anesthetic produce different EEG-derived index bispectral index . However , control study demonstrate difference analgesic potency . The aim clinical trial evaluate difference analgesic potency sevoflurane desflurane equi-minimum alveolar concentration use surgical pleth index .
